champ.champInfo:
The general management of the competition is carried out by the Lviv Regional Kyokushinkai Karate Federation.
Direct management is entrusted to the Lviv Regional Federation of Kyokushinkai Karate and the main panel of judges.
The chief judge of the competition was approved by the judge of the national category King O.O. (3rd dan, Lviv).
The chief secretary of the competition was approved by the judge of the national category, King Ya.O. (3rd dan, Lviv).
Competition judging is conducted in accordance with the standards and rules of the Kyokushinkai-kan International Karate Organization (5 judges, flag signaling). Referees must wear black pants, a blue shirt and a white bow tie, a personal whistle. Neither the organizers of the competition, nor the panel of judges, nor anyone else are responsible for accidents and bodily injuries that may occur during the matches.

The competition will take place on September 23-24, 2023 in the city of Lviv, Ukraine (sports complex of NU "Lviv Polytechnic University", Samchuk St., 14)

Competition organizing committee: NGO "Lviv Regional Kyokushinkai Karate Federation"

E-mail: jarynko@gmail.com

King Yaryna, phone: +38 063-946-75-46

Registration of tournament participants takes place through a personal account on the website https://www.alliance-kumite.net.
Preliminary applications for participation in the competition must be sent by September 17, 2023 (inclusive).
Telephone numbers for preliminary applications: Ihor Tatarchenko - 0677887728;

Program

September 22, 2023

  • 10.00-12.00 - arrival of the teams. pre-weighing
  • 13.30-16.00 - weighing of participants, mandate commission
  • 16.30-18.30 – judges' seminar
  • 19.00-20.00 - drawing of lots

Competition participants

Athletes with qualifications of 0-9kyu and 7-8kyu take part in the "First Step" tournament. Categories are formed separately for 0-9kyu and 8-7kyu. Athletes with qualifications from 6k take part in the "Championship of Lviv Region" tournament.
If an athlete with a qualification below 6k takes part in the championship of the Lviv region, he must be submitted in the application as a participant with 6k.
Allocation to the "First Step" and "Championship of Lviv Region" tournaments is based solely on the qualification of the participant.
Be careful when applying!
All participants of the "First Step" tournament will be divided by year of birth into a category of eight people. The duration of the match is 1 minute, after which the judges must determine the winner. Competitions in the "Championship of the Lviv region" tournament (individual) are held according to the Olympic or round robin systems.

September 23, 2023 ("The First Step")

  • 09:00-10:00 – a meeting of competition judges
  • 10:00-10:30 - ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 10:30-18:00 – qualifying matches in the "kumite" section
  • 18:00-20:00 – the final part of the competition
  • 20:00 – end of competition, awarding of winners and prize-winners

September 24, 2023("Championship of Lviv region")

  • 09:00-09:45 – meeting of competition judges
  • 10:00-10:30 - ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 10:30-17:00 – qualifying matches in the "kumite" section
  • 17:00-19:00 – the final part of the competition
  • 19:00 – end of competition, awarding of winners and prize-winners

Tournament rules

Competitions are held in accordance with the "Kyokushinkai Karate Competition Rules" in force in Ukraine.
Team qualifying is common for male and female participants.
To determine the places of teams based on individual and team championships, the results of only those participants included in the qualifying teams will be taken into account.
The standings of the teams are finally determined by the mandate committee. Team points are calculated according to the rules of kyokushinkai karate competitions in force in Ukraine

Categories KUMITE ("The First Step")

  • 2007-2008: -40; -45; -50; -55; -60; -65; +65
  • 2009-2010: -35; -40; -45; -50; -55; -60; +60
  • 2011-2012: -30; -35; -40; -45; -50; -55; +55
  • 2013-2014: -25; -30; -35; -40; -50; +50
  • 2015-2015: -20; -25; -30; -35; -40; +40
  • 2016-2016: -20; -25; -30; -35; -40; +40

Categories of KUMITE ("Championship of Lviv region")

  • 2007-2008 (young men): -50; -55; -60; -65; -70; -75; +75
  • 2007-2008 (girls): -50; -55; -60; -65; +65
  • 2009-2010: -35; -40; -45; -50; -55; -60; +60
  • 2011-2012: -30; -35; -40; -45; -50; -55; +55
  • 2013-2014: -25; -30; -35; -40; -50; +50

Holding of matches and duration of matches "Championship of Lviv Region".

  • 2009-2014: 1.0 min., 1.0 min., 1.0 min.
  • 2007-2008: 1.5 min., 1.5 min., 1.5 min.

Rewarding

The 1st, 2nd and two 3rd places are awarded with cups and medals. All those who lose are awarded diplomas "For participation".
